title: Verden
content:
Verden is one of the minor forces in Severních království, located at the very mouth of the river Jaruga, with Bremervoord a Brokilon on its northern borders, a Cintra in the south, just on the other side of the river.

Verden is ruled by král Ervyll at the beginning of Sága o Zaklínači. He is later succeeded by his son Kistrin.
